CustomField.description: Icon representation of the Amenities multi select picklist
CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'High Floor') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/highfloor.png', 'Views' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Views') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/views.png', 'Views' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Club Access') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/clubaccess.png', 'Club Access' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Gym') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/gym.png', 'Gym' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Pool') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/pool.png', 'Pool' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Mini bar') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/minibar.png', 'Mini bar' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Aisle Seat') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/aisleseat.png', 'Aisle Seat' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Window Seat') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/windowseat.png', 'Window Seat' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Powered Seat') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/poweredseat.png', 'Powered Seat' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Exit Row') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/exitrow.png', 'Exit Row' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Meals') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/meals.png', 'Meals' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Wifi') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/wifi.png', 'Wifi' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Unlimited Mileage') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/unlimitedmileage.png', 'Unlimited Mileage' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Fuel Option') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/fueloption.png', 'Fuel Option' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'In Terminal Pick up') , ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Bluetooth') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/bluetooth.png', 'BlueTooth' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Cruise Control') , IMAGE('/resource/tth_amenity_icons/cruisecontrol.png', 'Cruise Control' , 50, 50) ,'') & IF( INCLUDES( tth_Amenities_pl__c , 'Reversing Camera') ,
